attributes.action: Stop the BBC spending license payers money on things like a new set for Eastenders!
attributes.additional_details:
Help stop the BBC using the money we pay for our TV license on things like a new Eastenders set.

I don't know about you but I pay my TV license like most others, therefore I beleive the government should help us have a say in how license fee money is spent within the BBC.

I understand that some people might not have a problem with this as they like this soap. My problem is not with this, it is just the ridiculous amount of money being spent and we have no say.

rejection.details: For the BBC to decide upon.
